name: Mighty Heroes Racing 2018
description:
The mighty heroes have taken a day off from saving the world and decided to hold a Mighty Heroes Racing competition. A new race champion will emerge from this competition. Plant your feet on the speed tracks and take off like a fighter jet and keep running race to victory.

What does a mutant hero do when they’re not out saving the world? They compete to see who is fastest Mighty race champion, obviously. OXO Games Studio gives you the chance to find out who could be your race champion of 2018 with this 3D mutant hero championship.

FEATURES:
• Best Mighty Heroes Racing game of 2018
• Choose your champion among the mighty heroes
• Amazing mutant heroes
• Awesome and amazing characters to race with
• Exciting and friendly running competition
• Life-like race tracks
• Smooth and easy controls
• Beautiful HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Sports music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
